( Photo : AP ) Corey Sligh, an actor on ` ` The Young and the Restless,'' has been convicted by a Georgia jury of molesting a child under 10, according to The Atlanta Journal - Constitution. A Cherokee County jury convicted Sligh, 30, last month of one count of child molestation, according to court records. He was cleared of another count of molestation.
